channel.title: Two-FA on ShenYu
channel.description: Recent content in Two-FA on ShenYu

item.title: Apache ShenYu Two FA (By Apache ShenYu Committers)
item.description: Two-Factor Authentication(2FA) Two factor authentication (2FA) refers to the authentication method that combines both passport, and an object (credit card, SMS phone, token or biomarkers as fingerprint) to identify a user. To ensure the security of the committerâ€™s account, we need you to enable 2FA to sign in and contribute codes on GitHub. More details, please refer to 2FA. To be noticed: If you do not enable 2FA, you will be removed from the project and unable to access our repositories and the fork from our private repository.
